Class XmlNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.oj.xml.XmlNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<XmlNode>

    public class XmlNode
extends Object
implements Iterable<XmlNode>
    Basic node object used by xml parser.
    Author:
    fish

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAttribute(String key, String value)
      Add new attribute into the attribute list, if the attribute list is null or there is same attribute in the list, throw AppException.
      void addChild(XmlNode child)
      Add a new child node into the child nodes list, if the child node or child nodes list is null, or this is same node in the child node list, throw AppException.
      String getAttribute(String key)
      Get specified attribute innerText from the attribute list, if the attribute list is null or there is no such attribute in the attribute list, return empty string, otherwise return the innerText of this attribute.

      • addAttribute

        public void addAttribute(String key,
                String value)
                  throws AppException
        Add new attribute into the attribute list, if the attribute list is null or there is same attribute in the list, throw AppException.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the attribute we want to add
        value - attribute innerText
        Throws:
        AppException

      • removeAttribute

        public void removeAttribute(String key)
                     throws AppException
        Remove specified attribute from the attribute list, if the attribute is null or there is such attribute in the list, throw AppException.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the attribute we want to remove
        Throws:
        AppException

      • getAttribute

        public String getAttribute(String key)
                    throws AppException
        Get specified attribute innerText from the attribute list, if the attribute list is null or there is no such attribute in the attribute list, return empty string, otherwise return the innerText of this attribute.
        Parameters:
        key - the attribute name
        Returns:
        the innerText of the attribute
        Throws:
        AppException

      • addChild

        public void addChild(XmlNode child)
              throws AppException
        Add a new child node into the child nodes list, if the child node or child nodes list is null, or this is same node in the child node list, throw AppException.
        Parameters:
        child - new child node
        Throws:
        AppException
